A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've heard all I want to hear about this. That awful opening\, Leia flying like Superman\, Luke being completely out of character\, Holdo not telling anyone her plan\, Rose's utter delusion when \"saving\" Finn... I wasn't even particularly attached to Star Wars\, and even I'm kind of offended by what Rian Johnson did here. When I saw The Force Awakens\, while I was painfully aware of how similar it was to A New Hope\, I also wanted to see how the story progressed. But it didn't progress. The Last Jedi took everything backwards. They should have just let J.J. Abrams do the whole trilogy.
